Class EditorSerializer

java.lang.Object
main.java.text_editor.serialization.EditorSerializer
public class EditorSerializer extends Object
The EditorSerializer class provides static methods for saving and loading editor instances. It uses Java serialization to persist and restore editor state.
Author:
Ugnius Tei≈°erskis

  • Method Details

    • saveEditor

      public static void saveEditor(Editor editor, String fileName) throws IOException
      Saves an editor instance to a file.
      Parameters:
      editor - the editor to save
      fileName - the path to the file where the editor will be saved
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during serialization

    • loadEditor

      public static Editor loadEditor(String fileName) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Loads an editor instance from a file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the path to the file containing the serialized editor
      Returns:
      the deserialized editor instance
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during deserialization
      ClassNotFoundException - if the class of the serialized object cannot be found
